extendedInfo.description: The Somerset County Library System (SCLS) mobile app gives users access to the libraryâs catalog and their account.  Access and download e-books, e-audio and video through Overdrive in one step.  Place materials on hold, renew borrowed items, check on upcoming programs, take note of branch locations and hours, even ask a librarian for help!  Even better, scan the ISBN bar code of any book in a store and Boopsie will automatically scan the SCLS catalog for the title and place a hold on it if it is in the collection.

reviews.comment: Love love love this app. Now whenever some book or cd pops in my head I don\'t have to run to a computer before I forget in order to submit a request!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: But which SOMERSET
reviews.comment: pity it says nothing about it being Somerset in America, for those who inhabit the rest of the world this is an App for Maine in the USA and not Somerset anywhere else. I\'m sure its brilliant, but useless if your in the UK. I didn\'t want to rate this as I have no idea how good it may be, but apparently that\'s required too, and no option to avoid it. since everyone else reckons its good I gave it 5 too
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stopped working with Android update
reviews.comment: Used to work fine, tablet updated to android 4.2.2, now it doesn\'t work...  By the way, this is the Somerset County NJ, USA library system\'s app.
reviews.author: Paul Malarcher

reviews.title: Missing digital titles
reviews.comment: What happened to the digital media? My checked out digital titles are unavailable in the app.
reviews.author: Jose David Camara
